column6: Moonstone is now Ms. Marvel, but will the world accept her in Carol Danvers' stead? And between Osborn and A.I.M., where do her allegiances actually lie?
column8: | colorist:Rainier Beredo | inker:Mike Deodato | writer:Brian Reed | letterer:Dave Sharpe | penciller:Sana Takeda | other:Akihide Yanagi
